p: Coronaviruses are nonsegmented, enveloped, positive-sense, single-strand ribonucleic acid viruses, belonging to the Coronaviridae family [ 1]. Six types of coronavirus have been identified that cause human disease: four cause mild respiratory symptoms, whereas the otherÂ two, Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) coronavirus and severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) coronavirus, have caused epidemics with high mortality rates.
